Whose roof is the open air,
'In this sign conquer' is written
On each inaccessible lair.
I love you, provincial retreats,
Off the map, off the road, past the farm.
The more thumbed and grubby the book,
The greater for me its charm.
Slow lines of lumbering carts,
You spell out an alphabet leading
From meadow to meadow. Your pages
Were always my favourite reading.
And suddenly here it is written
Again, in the first snow — the spidery
Cursive italic of sleigh runners —
A page like a piece of embroidery.
A silvery-hazel October.
Pewter shine since the frosts began.
Autumnal twilight of Chekov,
Tchaikovsky and Levitan.
Love is for some a heavy cross,
But in you there is no contortion,
The key to life's enigma is
The charm that is your secret portion.
In spring rustling is heard again,
And news and truths that ripple running.
Your race has sprung from such a strain;
Like air, your mind is free from cunning.
Easy to wake, again to see,
To shake out the heart's wordy litter.
Nor henceforth choked in life to be, —
No need for skill in such a matter.
Three months ago, it all had started.
The early blizzards swept by, rushing
Over our fields and yards unguarded
With some unmanageable passion.
I then made up my mind at once,
As though a hermit on vocation,
I’d write of winter and perchance,
I would complete my spring collection.
But trivialities, like mounts, arose,
Like snow-banks, standing in my way,
And all my plans, it seemed, were lost,
As winter passed on, day by day.
I, then, perceived and got to know
Why on this foul and stormy night,
She pierced the darkness with the snow
And from the garden, peeked inside.
She sighed and whispered to me tensely,
“Please hurry!” — pale from the cold.
But I was sharpening my pencil
And awkwardly, dismissed her call.
And while one early morning, I,
Behind the desk, delayed each sentence,
The winter came... and passed me by
With some unrecognized resemblance.

translation.en: Bursting himself through bushes, as if from a snare.

And stains we long had waited,
And round us both were memories

translation.ru: Не ход часов, но звон цепов
translation.en: No clocks chimed, but the flail rang clear
From dawn to dusk and planted
Its dreams of stings into the air.
The weather was enchanted.
Strolled sunset to its heart’s content,
They yielded to cicadas
And stars and trees its government
Of gardens and of larders.
The moon in absence, out of sight.
Not shade but baulks was throwing.
And softly, softly the shy night
From cloud to cloud was flowing.

Forgetful than faint-hearted.
Soft rain was shuffling at the door
And smell of wine-corks spurted.

translation.en: So smelt the dust. So smelt the grass
And if we chanced to heed them.
Smell from the gentry’s teaching was
Of brotherhood and freedom.
The councils met in villages;

translation.ru: С другими — вы, не так ли?
translation.en: Weren’t you with those that held them?
Bright with wood-sorrel hung the days,
And smell of wine-corks filled them.
They stood almost blocking the pavement and stores,
As if scanning the wares in a show window’s glare;
The stretcher slid though past the ambulance doors,
The medics jumped in; they drove into the square.
And passing by sidewalks, by courtyards and gapers,
Through tumult and chaos of streets in the night,
The rescue squad’s headlights massaged the soft vapors,
Dove into opaqueness devoid of all light.
Policemen and faces, a bleak alleyway
Flashed by all agleam as the vehicle sped;
Clutching an atropine phial and a spray,
The EMT tech scanned the roof overhead.

translation.ru: Шел дождь, и в приемном покое
translation.en: Rain fell as they bore him to ER reception,
Where a querulous drain dripped and slurred.

translation.ru: Меж тем как строка за строкою
translation.en: Line after line in his dim apperception,
On forms for admittance the scribbled words blurred.
They gave him a cot by the entryway rooms,
For the wing was jam-packed with the ill.
An iodine reek blew about noxious fumes;

translation.ru: И с улицы дуло в окно.
translation.en: A breeze from the street touched the window and sill.
One smidgen of garden, a portion of sky
Were posed in the window-frame square.
The just-arrived patient trained keen avid eye
On ward floors and white coats and stair.
But the soft reverie of his mind unattended
Was jolted by inquiries the duty nurse made.
Her head-shaking mien and her glum look portended:
A sad end to this mess you’re not apt to evade.
Then he gazed out with gratitude flooding his soul
At the wall that was gleaming beyond window’s frame.
On that wall, as if sparks from bituminous coal,
Did the lights of the city their message declaim.
In sunset’s reflection a far gate glowed red,
The blaze of a maple tree smoldered, and now
A long gnarly branch of that tree tossed its head,
Then sent to the sick man a low farewell bow.
“O Lord (thought the patient), “how perfect thy ways,
Thy people, and walls and the scope of thy breath;
The beds and the parquet, the warmth of thy gaze,
And the black of the city on the night of my death.
“A sleeping-draught dosage I’ve taken for rest,
And I clutch at my handkerchief, weep;
O God, all the tears of emotions distressed
Are blinding my eyes while thy soft face I seek.
“Faint glimmers on walls make the air radiate,
Illumining beds and the ward tossed adrift;
How sweet is the thought that my self and my fate,
All my heartbeats and days are Thy own precious gift.
“As I fade into death in this hospital bed
I can sense Thy warm touch while life lingers;
Like a filigreed ring, with a promise unsaid,

translation.ru: И прячешь, как перстень, в футляр».

translation.ru: Он шел из Вифании в Ерусалим,
translation.en: He was walking from Bethany to Jerusalem,
Brooding over sad premonitions.

translation.ru: Колючий кустарник на круче был выжжен,

translation.ru: Над хижиной ближней не двигался дым,
translation.en: No smoke was rising over a nearby hut,

translation.ru: Был воздух горяч, и камыш неподвижен,
translation.en: The air was hot and the reeds motionless,
And the calm of the Dead Sea lay still.

translation.ru: И в горечи, спорившей с горечью моря,
translation.en: And with a bitterness rivalling the sea's,

translation.ru: Он шел с небольшою толпой облаков
translation.en: He walked with a small throng of clouds

translation.ru: По пыльной дороге на чье-то подворье,
translation.en: Along a dusty road, to somebody's backyard,

translation.ru: Шел в город на сборище учеников.
translation.en: On His way to a gathering of disciples.

translation.ru: И так углубился он в мысли свои,
translation.en: And so immersed was He in His thoughts,

translation.ru: Что поле в уныньи запахло полынью.
translation.en: That the field, dejected, sent off a wormwood smell.

translation.ru: Все стихло. Один он стоял посредине,
translation.en: All was still. He stood alone in the midst of it,

translation.ru: А местность лежала пластом в забытьи.
translation.en: While the land lay prostrate in swoon.
All became muddled, the heat, the desert,

translation.ru: И ящерицы, и ключи, и ручьи.
translation.en: The lizards, the springs, the streams.
A fig tree rose not too far off,

translation.ru: Совсем без плодов, только ветки да листья.
translation.en: Fruitless, nothing but branches and leaves.

translation.ru: И он ей сказал: «Для какой ты корысти?
translation.en: And He said to it: "Of what use are you?

translation.ru: Какая мне радость в твоем столбняке?
translation.en: 'What joy does your stupor bring me?

translation.ru: Я жажду и алчу, а ты — пустоцвет,
translation.en: «I thirst and hunger, yet you stand barren,

translation.ru: И встреча с тобой безотрадней гранита.
translation.en: My meeting you is joyless as granite.

translation.ru: О, как ты обидна и недаровита!
translation.en: O, how offensive and ungifted you are!
Remain as you are, then, till the end of time.»
A tremor of condemnation ran through the tree,
Like a spark of lightning down a rod.

translation.ru: Найдись в это время минута свободы
translation.en: If only a moment of freedom had been given

translation.ru: У листьев, ветвей, и корней, и ствола,
translation.en: To the leaves, the branches, roots, trunk,
The laws of nature could have intervened.

translation.ru: Но чудо есть чудо, и чудо есть Бог.
translation.en: But a miracle is a miracle, and a miracle is God.

translation.ru: Когда мы в смятеньи, тогда средь разброда
translation.en: When we're in confusion, in the midst of disorder,

translation.ru: Не плачь, не морщь опухших губ,
translation.en: Don’t cry. Don’t tense your swollen lips,
Don’t pack them into creases.
You’ll irritate those dried up bits
Of scabs from vernal fevers.
Withdraw you hand, don’t touch my chest,
We’re cables under voltage.

translation.ru: Друг к другу вновь, того гляди,
translation.en: To one another, by some chance
We may be thrown by fortune.

translation.ru: Пройдут года, ты вступишь в брак,
translation.en: The years will pass and you shall wed,
You will forget this love then.
To be a woman, — a great step.
To drive insane, — a talent.

translation.ru: А я пред чудом женских рук,
translation.en: Under the spell of female hands,
The spell of shoulders, backs, and necks,
As you can see, I’ve lost my sense,
Bewitched by their divine effects.
No matter how the night might bind, —
Its dismal ring just cannot match
The force to leave it all behind
And passion tempts me to detach.
I’ve set my folks on a vacation,
From friends I’ve drifted far apart,
And now the permanent dejection

translation.ru: Полно всё в сердце и природе.
translation.en: Submerses nature and the heart.

translation.ru: И вот я здесь с тобой в сторожке.

translation.ru: Теперь на нас одних с печалью
translation.en: The lodge’s wooden walls now gaze
At us with grief and hopelessness.
We never vowed to break restrains,
We will decline with openness.

translation.ru: Мы сядем в час и встанем в третьем,
translation.en: We’ll sit at one. By three, we’ll rise,

translation.ru: Я с книгою, ты с вышиваньем,
translation.en: I — with my book, you — with the sewing.
There won’t be time to realize
How we stop kissing in the morning.
The leaves, spontaneous and vast,
Will rustle, gliding though the air
To fill the cup of sorrows passed
Once more, with present day despair.
Such zest, affection and delight!
We’ll rush into September’s riot!
In autumn rustle, come and hide,
Go crazy, or just stand there quiet!
The way you shed your clothes in haste,
Like woods shed leaves onto the ground,
When falling into my embrace,
You fling aside your dressing gown!
You are the boon of a fatal step,
When there’s no reason left to bother,
And beauty’s root is courage and

translation.en: This draws us closer to each other.
I am dead, but you are living.
And the wind, moaning and grieving,
Rocks the house and the forest,

But further than the furthest
Horizon all together,
Like boat-hulls and bowsprits
In an unruffled anchorage,
Rocked not from high spirits
Or out of aimless rage,

translation.ru: А чтоб в тоске найти слова

Words for your cradle-song.

translation.en: That eyes in a storm go all lilac like lawns,

That sunset at wayside has eddy to shine

Because of your amazing presence

translation.en: That, for the very first of times,

translation.en: I live on Earth and see your essence.
I often think: perhaps, the Lord,
When looking for the color, found
And took it from inside my heart
And dipped His brush to paint your crowns.

translation.ru: И если мне близка, как вы,
translation.en: If there’s a friend among my class
As intimate as you, my tree-friends,
He has the simple grace of grass,
Uncommonness of heights and greenness.
The night is now departing
It’s lifting its dark shrouds,
And pilot, voyage starting,
Is bound for heaven’s clouds.
He’s swallowed in the vapour,
In jet plane disappeared,
A cross as marked by draper,
A blotch on linen sheared.
Below in foreign places
Are gay nocturnal bars,
And soldiers’, stokers’ faces,
And station’s railway cars.
Its wing is shadow spreading
Across the cloud on high.
And clustered stars are treading
Around it in the sky.
With dreadful, dreadful churning
And sickening display
To other worlds is turning
The slick of Milky Way.
And in the boundless spaces
Are continents on fire.
In subterranean places
The sleepless stokers tire.
In Paris under gable
Some Venus or a Mars
Is scanning tawdry playbill
Announcing some new farce.
At safe remove some fellow
In garret cannot sleep,
And candle flickers yellow
In tile-reflected leap.
A planet he peruses
As if the starry vault
Connection somehow chooses
With anxious night’s assault.
Don’t sleep, don’t sleep, but labour,
To work don’t set a bar,
Fight nodding off with sabre
Like pilot, like a star.
Don’t rest from art’s creation,
To sleep do not succumb.
For time’s incarceration
Must endless beat its drum.

translation.ru: Пью горечь тубероз, небес осенних горечь
translation.en: I drink the bitterness of primroses and autumn skies,

translation.ru: И в них твоих измен горящую струю.
translation.en: They hold the burning torrents of your faithlessness:

translation.ru: Пью горечь вечеров, ночей и людных сборищ,
translation.en: The bitterness of evenings, nights, and human crowds,
I drink my sobbing stanzas’ sodden bitterness.

We hate the safety of the daily bread.

translation.en: Let the unstable night wind serve and make the toast:

translation.en: Things need not happen that were wished or said.
Heredity and death are with us at the feast.

translation.ru: И тихою зарей — верхи дерев горят —

translation.ru: B сухарнице, как мышь, копается анапест,
translation.en: Mouselike, the anapest rustles in biscuit tins,

translation.ru: И золушка, спеша, меняет свой наряд.
translation.en: And Cinderella runs and changes her attire.

translation.ru: Полы подметены, на скатерти — ни крошки,
translation.en: The floor is swept, and clean the tablecloth.

translation.ru: Как детский поцелуй, спокойно дышит стих,
translation.en: Like kisses of a child, my verses’ breath is peace.

translation.ru: И золушка бежит — во дни удач на дрожках,
translation.en: And Cinderella flees — when lucky, in the coach —

translation.ru: А сдан последний грош, — и на своих двоих.
translation.en: But if her last is spent — on her two feet.
In spring before the dawn we see
Heaps in the kitchen garden,
As pagans for fertility
Their festal altars burden.
The fresh-cut clods flame in my plot;
In steams at early morning,
And all the earth becomes red-hot
Just like an oven burning.
I cast aside this shirt of mine
Where my earth-labour takes me;

translation.ru: И в спину мне ударит зной
translation.en: The heat strikes down upon my spine
And like wet clay it bakes me.
I stand up where the sun's rays beat;
With screwed-up eyes I burnish
Myself from head to foot with heat,
As with a fiery varnish.

translation.ru: А ночь войдет в мой мезонин
translation.en: Night, bursting on the corridor
Comes to my sleeping quarter
And leaves me brimming like a jar
With lilac and with water.
The upper layer she wipes away
From cooling walls, and laden
With me for gift she offers me
To any country maiden.

translation.ru: О, знал бы я, что так бывает,
translation.en: If only, when I made my début,
There might have been a way to tell
That lines with blood in them can murder,
That they can flood the throat and kill,
I certainly would have rejected
A jest on such a sour note.
So bashful was that early interest,
The start was something so remote.
But age is pagan Rome, demanding
No balderdash, no measured breath.
No fine feigned parody of dying,
But really being done to death.
A line that feeling sternly dictates
Sends on the stage a slave, and, faith.
It is good-bye to art forever
Then, then things smack of soil and Fate.

translation.ru: Я клавишей стаю кормил с руки
translation.en: I was feeding the flock of keys out of my hand

translation.ru: Под хлопанье крыльев, плеск и клекот.
translation.en: To a beating of wings. I was standing on tiptoe,

translation.ru: Я вытянул руки, я встал на носки,
translation.en: My hands reaching out to the splashing and screaming

translation.ru: Рукав завернулся, ночь терлась о локоть.
translation.en: My sleeve was rolled up and night brushed my elbow.

translation.ru: И было темно. И это был пруд
translation.en: And it was pitch dark. And there was a pond

translation.ru: И волны. — И птиц из породы люблю вас,
translation.en: And waves. And the love-birds and suchlike, it seemed,
Would surely be pecked to death long before those
Whose black, strident, savage beaks screamed.

translation.ru: И это был пруд. И было темно.
translation.en: And there was a pond. And it was pitch dark
Except where the lilies like torches were flickering.
A wave was gnawing the planks of the dinghy.

translation.ru: У лодки. И грызлися птицы у локтя.
translation.en: And birds at my elbow were snapping and bickering.

translation.ru: И ночь полоскалась в гортанях запруд,
translation.en: Night rattled like phlegm in the throats of the ponds.
The fledgling had yet to be fed, it seemed,

translation.ru: И самки скорей умертвят, чем умрут
translation.en: And the females would peck it to death long before
The roulades would cease in the gullet that screamed.
Days spread out with distinct somberness.
The disconsolate brook flows along
In front of my entry hall porch door
Outside my window’s unblocked view.
Outside the fence along the road
The public garden flows from its bank.
Sprawling down, like beasts from a lair,
Tumultuous clouds lie low.
The book of nasty weather reveals
To me the loveliness of the land.
For you I describe woodland cones
At the top of the page where I write.
Oh Marina it’s been a long time,

translation.ru: Да и труд не такой уж ахти,
translation.en: And to bring back in remembrance
Your ashes from far-off Elaguba
Alas is no hardship at all.
In past years I intended to bear
Your triumph forward across the wide
Expanse of the dry snow, where wintering,
It was a longboat frozen in the ice.

translation.ru: Мне так же трудно до сих пор
translation.en: I am baffled in the season of sowing,
Like a miserly millionaire who knows
His sister wastes of starvation,
To imagine you actually dead.

translation.ru: Что сделать мне тебе в угоду?
translation.en: Can you explain how I might please you?
Something, somehow, let me know.
For, in the silence of your departure
There was, unspoken, a reproach.
Loss is forever enigmatic.
For clues of some explanation
I search anguished and without results:
Death has neither definition nor outline.
Here all is — shifting and shadow,
Detritus and self-deception,
With the merest of faith in resurrection
And some signs of a debt owed.
Winter — like a lavish funeral banquet:
Is to go outside the house, to add
Dried currants to the darkening night,
To spill wine — so much for getting drunk.
In front of the house the apple tree’s in a drift.
And the village is imprisoned in snow —
Your overpowering gravestone,
To me seems like the breadth of a year.
And now your face is turned to God,

translation.ru: Ты тянешься к Нему с земли,
translation.en: You stretch out from earth to him,

Trembled from the morning's first chills

translation.ru: То, что тихо тебе я рассказываю,
translation.en: And the words that I whispered in quiet sighs
Resembled the slumbering hills.
By some chance, we were caught here together,
By one mystery, in the timid fidelity,
As the landscape beyond the Neva, —
Lands of Petersburg stretching unendingly.
In those distant, impregnable thickets,
On this vernal and pale white night,
The nightingales' thunderous singing
Awoke all the woodlands in sight.
Their song was blaring with emotion,
And those birds in a magical chorus,
Evoked both, passion and commotion,
From the depths of the mesmerized forest.
To those parts, like a barefooted wanderer,
By the fence, the night slowly walked

translation.ru: И за ней с подоконника тянется
translation.en: And behind it, from the windowsill, rambling,
Ran the trail of an overheard talk.
Within an earshot of our conversations,
In the fenced enclosures of the garden,
The apple and the berry trees, with patience,
Put on the sunlight's glowing garments.
And trees, like phantoms, seeming white,
By the roadside, gathered in line,
To pay their dues to the receding white night
That has witnessed so much in its time.
To April as before.

translation.ru: Весна, я с улицы, где тополь удивлён,
translation.en: Spring, I come in from the street, where the poplar is shaken,

translation.ru: Где даль пугается, где дом упасть боится,
translation.en: Where distance is frightened, the house afraid it will fall,

translation.ru: Где воздух синь, как узелок с бельеём
translation.en: Where the air is blue as the laundry bag
Of a patient released from hospital.

translation.ru: Где вечер пуст, как прерванный рассказ,
translation.en: Where evening is empty, an unfinished tale
Left in the air by a star with no sequel,
Bewildering thousands of noisy eyes,
Expressionless, unfathomable.

translation.ru: Я живу с твоей карточкой, с той, что хохочет,
translation.en: It’s with your laughing picture that I’m living now,

translation.ru: У которой суставы в запястьях хрустят,
translation.en: You whose wrists are so slender and crackle at the joints,

translation.ru: Той, что пальцы ломает и бросить не хочет,
translation.en: You who wring your hands yet are unwilling to go,

translation.ru: У которой гостят и гостят и грустят.
translation.en: You whose guests stay for hours sharing sadness and joys.

translation.ru: Что от треска колод, от бравады ракочи,
translation.en: You who’ll run from the cards and Rakoczy bravura,

translation.ru: От стекляшек в гостиной, от стекла и гостей
translation.en: From the glass of the drawing-room and from the guests

translation.ru: По пианино в огне пробежится и вскочит —
translation.en: To the keyboard on fire, unable to endure

translation.ru: От розеток, костяшек, и роз, и костей.
translation.en: Bones and roses and dice and rosettes and the rest.

translation.ru: Чтоб прическу ослабив и чайный и шалый,
translation.en: You will fluff up your hair, and a reckless tea-rose,
Smelling of cigarettes, pin to your bright-red sash,
And then waltz to your glory, your sadness and woes

translation.ru: Закусивши, как муку, и еле дыша.
translation.en: Tossing off like a scarf, beaming, breathless and flushed.
You will crumple the skin of an orange and swallow
Cooling morsels again and again in your haste

translation.ru: В опоясанный люстрой, позади, за гардиной,
translation.en: To return to the hall, to the whirling and mellow
Lights, and air with the sweet sweat of fresh waltzes laced.

translation.ru: Так сел бы вихрь, чтоб на пари
translation.en: Defying steam and scorching breath
The way a whirlwind dies,

translation.ru: И мглу и иглы, как мюрид,
translation.en: The way a murid faces death
With wide unflinching eyes.
Know all: not mountains’ noise and hush,
And not a purebred steed-
The reckless roses in your sash
Are riding at full speed.

translation.ru: Не он, не он, не шепот гор,
translation.en: No, not the clatter of the hoofs
And not the mountains’ hush,

translation.ru: Но только то, но только то,
translation.en: But only she who stands aloof
With flowers in her sash.

translation.ru: И только то, что тюль и ток,
translation.en: And only that is really It
What makes our ears ring,
And what the whirlwind-chasing feet,
Soul, tulle and silk sash bring.

translation.ru: Им, им — и от души смеша,
translation.en: Until sides split the jokes are cracked,
We’re rolling in the aisles,
The envy of the romping sacks-
Until somebody cries.
Old pails and tubs all over
The place; from the onset
The day is wet and awkward,
It drizzles at sunset,
And gulping down tears
The darkness gives a sigh,
At miles away one hears
Steam train's lonesome cry,
An early dusk comes down,
A sudden blackness falls,
Small things are breaking down
As always in the fall.
At midday anguish pierces
And fills the  autumn vale
By coming from a distance
A weeper's howl and wail.
When from across the river
It's wafted to my place,
I see the death and shiver,
I see it face to face.
I watch it from my cottage
Each fall, this one again,  —
My slowly approaching
Inevitable end.
See: winter swept the barrier
And there, in plain daylight,
Through yellow leaves of terror
Is staring at my life.
The distant stars were shining overhead.
Their light was cast upon the curving road.
The road was laid around Mount Olivet.
The Kedron brook was flowing down below.
The meadow was cut off right in the middle
And there, the Milky Way came into sight.
The grayish olives in their silver glitter
Would try to climb the sky into the night.

translation.ru: В конце был чей-то сад, наде́л земельный.
translation.en: There was a garden. Slowly, He approached
And leaving His disciples by the wall,
He said to them, “Wait here for Me. Keep watch.

translation.ru: Побудьте здесь и бодрствуйте со мной».
translation.en: I sense a fatal torment in My soul.”
He turned away without exasperation,
As though from what was borrowed in the past,
From both, supremacy and domination,

translation.ru: И был теперь, как смертные, как мы.
translation.en: And now, He was a mortal, just like us.
The widespread darkness now appeared to beckon
Into oblivion, into the barren space.
The vastness of the universe was vacant,

translation.ru: И только сад был местом для житья.
translation.en: The Garden was the only living place.

translation.ru: И, глядя в эти чёрные провалы,
translation.en: And looking at these chasms in the sky,
So empty, limitless, He felt a sudden dread.
So that the cup of death would pass Him by

translation.ru: В поту кровавом Он молил Отца.
translation.en: He begged His Father, wet with blood and sweat.
With prayer softening the deadly languor,

translation.ru: Он вышел за ограду. На земле
translation.en: He slowly headed back and saw, appalled,
As His disciples, with exhaustion anchored,
Were sleeping on the grass beside the wall.
He woke them up in rage: “Almighty deemed

translation.ru: Жить в дни мои, вы ж разлеглись, как пласт.
translation.en: You worthy of My presence, — you offend Him.
The hour of the Son of Man is here.

translation.ru: Он в руки грешников себя предаст».
translation.en: Into the hands of sinners, He’ll surrender.”
Just as He said this, out of nowhere, stormed
A mob of slaves, and wanderers assembled.
Lights, swords and Judas walking to the front,--
A traitor’s kiss upon his lips still trembled.
And Peter gripped his heavy sword. Unsettled,

translation.ru: И ухо одному из них отсе́к.
translation.en: He cut off someone’s ear in the discord.
He hears: “This clash can’t be resolved with metal!

translation.ru: Вложи свой меч на место, человек.
translation.en: Good man, I say to you, put down your sword.
Oh, do you think My Father wouldn’t send

translation.ru: Отец не снарядил бы мне сюда?
translation.en: The winged legion to protect Me here?

translation.ru: И, волоска тогда на мне не тронув,
translation.en: They’d never touch a hair upon My head, —
Without a trace, My foes would disappear.

translation.ru: Но книга жизни подошла к странице,
translation.en: Know that the book of life has reached that page,
More valuable than all the blessings sent.
What’s written in the book cannot be changed,
Then let it all come true, I say. Amen.

translation.ru: Ты видишь, ход веков подобен притче
translation.en: You see, My time has reached the final hour.
Continuing, it may alight in gloom.
Thus, in the name of His majestic power,

translation.ru: Я в добровольных муках в гроб сойду.
translation.en: Accepting agony, I’ll step into the tomb.

translation.ru: Я в гроб сойду и в третий день восстану,
translation.en: I’ll step into the tomb soon overburdened,

translation.ru: И, как сплавляют по реке плоты,
translation.en: And on the third day, I’ll ascent. into my sight,

translation.ru: Ко мне на суд, как баржи каравана,
translation.en: As though in a procession for my verdict,
The centuries will flow out of the night…”
Outside, the blizzard sets in deep
And all its polish coats.
The paper seller is asleep,
Her kiosk, drifting, floats.
Not once we’ve happened to observe
In our lives’ lengthy course,
The snowfall comes with shy reserve
To trick our eyes perforce.
Concealing unrepentantly —
Beneath his ice-white mane
How often from the outskirts he
Has brought us home again!
The snowflakes cover everything,
Congealed with snow’s his gaze —
This shadow, with a drunkard’s swing,
To yard gropes in a daze.
With hasty movement, he has come:
For probably, once more,
What sinful seems perhaps to some
He’s swept behind the door.

translation.ru: Нет сил никаких у вечерних стрижей
translation.en: At twilight the swifts have no power,
to hold back that pale blue coolness.
It bursts from throats, a clamour

translation.ru: И льется, и нет с нею сладу.
translation.en: an outpour that can’t grow less.

translation.ru: И нет у вечерних стрижей ничего,
translation.en: The swifts have no way, high
up there, overhead, of restraining
their clarion cries: «O, triumph,
see, see, how the earth’s receding!»

translation.ru: Как белым ключом закипая в котле,
translation.en: Like steam from a boiling kettle,
the furious flow rushes by —
«See, see — no space for the earth
between the ravine and the sky.»

translation.ru: Грудь под поцелуи, как под рукомойник!
translation.en: Like water pooling from a pitcher, my mouth on your nipples!

translation.ru: Ведь не век, не сряду, лето бьет ключом.
translation.en: Not always. The summer well runs dry.

translation.ru: Ведь не ночь за ночью низкий рев гармоник
translation.en: Not for long the dust of our stamping feet, encore on encore

translation.ru: Подымаем с пыли, топчем и влечем.
translation.en: from the saxes on the casino's midnight bandstand.

translation.ru: Я слыхал про старость. Страшны прорицанья!
translation.en: I’ve heard of age — its obese warbling!

translation.ru: Рук к звездам не вскинет ни один бурун.
translation.en: When no wave will clap hands to the stars.

translation.ru: Говорят — не веришь. На лугах лица нет,
translation.en: If they speak, you doubt it. No face in the meadows,

translation.ru: У прудов нет сердца, бога нет в бору.
translation.en: no heart in the pools, no god among the pines.

translation.ru: Расколышь же душу! Bсю сегодня выпей.
translation.en: Split your soul like wood. Let today froth to your mouth.

translation.ru: Это полдень мира. Где глаза твои?
translation.en: It’s the world’s noontide. Have you no eyes for it?

translation.ru: Видишь, в высях мысли сбились в белый кипень
translation.en: Look, conception bubbles from the bleached fallows;

translation.ru: Дятлов, туч и шишек, жара и хвои.
translation.en: fir cones, woodpeckers, clouds, pine needles, heat.
Here the city’s trolley tracks give out.

translation.ru: Дальше служат сосны, дальше им нельзя.
translation.en: Further, you must put up with peeled pine. The trolley poles are detached.
Further, it’s Sunday. Boughs screwed loose for the picnic bonfire,
playing tag in your bra.
“The world is always like this,” say the woods,

translation.ru: Просит роща верить: мир всегда таков.
translation.en: as they mix the midday glare. Whitsunday and walking.

translation.ru: Так задуман чащей, так внушен поляне,
translation.en: All’s planned with checkerberry couches, inspired with clearings —

translation.ru: Так на нас, на ситцы пролит с облаков.
translation.en: the piebalds clouds spill down on us. a country woman’s house-dress.
In grass, among wild balsam,
Dog-dasies and lilies, we lie,
Our arms thrown back behind us,
Our faces turned to the sky.
The grass in the pine-wood ride
Is impenetrably thick.
We look at each other and shift
A shoulder-blade or a cheek.
And there, for a time immortal,
We are numbered among the trees
And liberated from aches,
Disease, and the last disease.
With deliberate monotony,
Like blue oil from green eaves,
The sky pours down on the ground,
Dappling and staining our sleeves.
We share the repose of the pines
To the ant’s accompaniment,
Inhaling the soporific
Incense-and-lemon scent.
So fiercely the fiery trunks
Leap up against the blue,

translation.ru: И мы так долго рук не вынем
translation.en: And under our resting heads
So long our hands rest too,
So broad our field of vision,
So docile all things on all sides,
That somewhere beyond the trunks
I imagine the surge of tides.
There waves are higher than branches,
And collapsing against the shore
They hurl down a hail of shrimps
From the ocean’s turbulent floor.
And at evening, the sunset floats
On corks behind a trawler
And, shimmering with fish oil
And amber mist, grows smaller.
Twilight descends and slowly
The moon hides all trace of day
Beneath the black magic of water,
Beneath the white magic of spray.

translation.ru: А волны все шумней и выше,
translation.en: And waves grow louder and higher
And the crowd at the floating café
Surrounds the pillar whose poster
Is a blur from far away.
Near Moscow living, I, this winter,

translation.ru: Но в стужу, снег и буревал
translation.en: In blizzard, chill, and snow,
On business when it was essential
Always caught the train to town.
When I went out on some occasions
The street was black as pitch.
And through the forests dark I scattered
My tread that creaked at every step.
Confronting me at the highway crossing
White willows straggled in the waste.
Above, the constellations towered
In January’s frozen ditch.
At the backyards, normally
The mail train or Number Forty
Tried hard to overhaul me, but I

translation.ru: А я шёл на шесть двадцать пять.
translation.en: Was aiming at the Six o’Clock.
Then the cunning wrinkles of the light
In feelers gathered round.
A searchlight sped full speed upon
The staggered viaduct.
In the compartment’s stifling heat,
I gave myself up wholly
To a surge of inborn weakness
I’d sucked in from the breast.
Through all the trials of the past,
The years of war and hardship,
I silently identified
Russia’s inimitable features.
Mastering my adoration,
And deifying, I observed:
Here were locksmiths, workers,
Students, and peasant women.

translation.ru: В них не было следов холопства,
translation.en: In them I found no servile traits
Such as great need imposes,
And, like any gentlemen, they bore
Discomfort and bad news.
Closely packed as in a carriage,
In every kind of pose,
Adults and children were engrossed
In reading as though they’d been wound up.
Then Moscow met us in the gloom
Which sometimes shone like silver,
And leaving the ambiguous light,
We walked out of the subway.
Posterity shoved me to the wall,
And splashed me on the way,
With fresh bird-cherry soap
And sweetly smelling honeycake.

translation.ru: Все утро с девяти до двух
translation.en: All morning from nine to two
A vexed spirit from the ozone rides
About the garden among snakes and rosemary
And the exhausted oleanders.
The white balcony turns blue.
Asleep — deserted by the muse — on all sides.
Hoary raspberry stalks stand and beyond them
Lies the violet ground of his preludes.
Who was whispering at supper?
Who gave a parting wave to the roses?
Once again Chopin sends out a dispatch,
A ballade that pines for reply.
All summer she is with diphtheria
And is not getting any better.
Now, is it the black keys or the blood

translation.ru: Иль позже кровь нам отворить ей?
translation.en: That after awhile make us turn from her?
A touch of a hand —
And half the universe — is alone,
And the fields out there are glowing
And breath is stifled by tobacco.
It drizzled, but not even grasses
Would bend within the bag of storm;

translation.ru: Лишь пыль глотала дождь в пилюлях,
translation.en: Dust only gulped its rain in pellets,
The iron roof — in powder form.
The village did not hope for healing.
Deep as a swoon the poppies yearned
Among the rye in inflammation,
And God in fever tossed and turned.
In all the sleepless, universal,
The damp and orphaned latitude,
The signs and moans, their posts deserting,
Fled with the whirlwind in pursuit.

translation.ru: За ними в бегстве слепли следом
translation.en: Behind them ran blind slanting raindrops
Hard on their heels, and by the fence

translation.ru: Меж мокрых веток с ветром бледным
translation.en: The wind and dripping branches argued —

translation.ru: Шел спор. Я замер. Про меня!
translation.en: My heart stood still — at my expense.
I felt this dreadful garden chatter
Would last forever, since the street

translation.ru: Еще я с улицы за речью
translation.en: Would also notice me, and mutter
With bushes, rain and window shutter.
No way to challenge my defeat —
They’d argue, talk me off my feet.

translation.ru: Чуть ночь, мой демон тут как тут,
translation.en: The night now falls, my demon’s here,
The reckoning for my past exacting.
Debauchery’s memories appear,
The lifeblood from my heart extracting,
Of how, seized by men’s whimsy’s steer,
I was propelled in mad distraction
And alleyways became my sphere.
But there is not much time left now,
And soon a deathly hush will settle.
But yet before they take their bow

translation.ru: Я жизнь свою, дойдя до края,
translation.en: In front of you my vital mettle
I’ll smash to bits at edge’s slough
Just like an alabaster vessel.

translation.ru: О, где бы я теперь была,
translation.en: Oh, where on earth now would I be,
O blessed Saviour and my Teacher?
Awaited me eternity
When at the desk I took my fee,
From caller I’d enticed to me
When with my craft I snared the creature.
Explain to me what sin can mean,

translation.ru: И смерть, и ад, и пламень серный,
translation.en: And death, and hell, and flame of sulphur,

translation.ru: Когда я на глазах у всех
translation.en: When there in front of all I keen —

translation.ru: С тобой, как с деревом побег,
translation.en: As if from you I’ve sprouted, green —
I find that more and more I suffer.
O my Lord Jesus, when I press
Your feet to me when all is over,
Perhaps I may then learn to bless
Your cross’s beams in my caress

translation.ru: И, чувств лишаясь, к телу рвусь,
translation.en: And clinging to your bloody mess
Prepare it for your tombstone’s cover.
Eve of festival finds people cleaning.
Now aside, away from teeming street
I anoint with oil — replete with meaning —
Pureness of your quite unsullied feet.
And your sandals somehow flee my fumbling,
For my vision’s clouded by my tears.
Like a shroud across my eyes are tumbling
Strands of straggling hair where salt adheres.

translation.ru: Ноги я твои в подол уперла,
translation.en: Feet I’ve pulled towards my dress’s border,
Jesus, with my teardrops they are drenched.

translation.ru: Ниткой бус их обмотала с горла,
translation.en: Wrapped them in a threaded beaded order,

translation.ru: В волосы зарыла, как в бурнус.
translation.en: Cleaved them to my heart as with a wrench.
Future now I see without restriction,
It’s as if you’ve brought it to a halt.
Now I have been given its prediction
With a sibyl’s foresight to a fault.
Temple’s curtain will be rent tomorrow,

translation.ru: Мы в кружок собьемся в стороне,
translation.en: In a frightened huddle we shall hide,
And perhaps you’ll spare me then some sorrow

translation.ru: Может быть, из жалости ко мне.
translation.en: As above the earth your feet are tied.
Horses’ hooves will then begin to thunder
As the soldiers start to march away.

translation.ru: Словно в бурю смерч, над головою
translation.en: And above, this cross will split asunder

translation.ru: Будет к небу рваться этот крест.
translation.en: Heaven with a whirlwind’s giddy play.

translation.ru: Брошусь на землю у ног распятья,
translation.en: Then beneath your cross in sad prostration
Wailing, I will faint and bite my lips.
Arms you stretch in cross’s vindication
To the world as yet your blood it drips.

translation.ru: Для кого на свете столько шири,
translation.en: Who’s this for, this grace of such expansion,
Such an anguish, such a mighty deed?

translation.ru: Есть ли столько душ и жизней в мире?
translation.en: Have they all a place in heaven’s mansion?
Do you for all nature’s creatures bleed?
Three-day vigil soon will reach its ending

A dish-like lake, serene and spacious,

translation.ru: Нынче в Спасском с дороги бревенчатый домик
translation.en: Now from the road, in Spasskoye, on the timbered cottage
Looks in hallucination the same agony.
Soft exchanges fill the air
And in some fervent rush,
From the forehead, strands of hair
Were gathered with a brush.
Helmed, she casts a single glance
Upon your face and waits,
Throwing back her head at once
With her dangling braids.
While the humid, muggy night
Insinuates a storm,
All the passersby outside
Quickly scatter home.
And the thunder can be heard now.
There, resounding, it rings.
By the widow-frame, the curtain,
In the crosswinds, swings.
All is silent, all is hushed now
And it’s humid all the while,
And the lightning’s golden flashes
Are still groping in the skyline…
But the sunrise will ensue
With a breaking light, so stifling,
And dry the puddled avenues,
From the downpours and lightning.
You will see a look still stagnant,
From the lack of sleep, sedate,
On those age-old, on those fragrant
Limes that simply will not fade.
Once upon a time,
Somewhere far away,
Riding through the steppe,
A horseman made his way.
Through the dust, he saw,
While he sped to fight,
A forest was emerging
Dreary, dark and wide.
His soul cried out in worry,
And his heart would race:
Tighten up your saddle,
Fear the watering-place.
But he didn’t listen,
And only gaining speed,
Straight onto the mound
He would lead his steed.
Turning from the barrow,
To an barren vale,
Past the higher ground,
Straight across the dale.
Down into the furrow
He took his horse apace
Where the trail led him
To a watering-place.
Heedless of the warning,
Quick to move, he took
His horse to drink the water
From the hidden brook.
Near the shallow water,
Where he made his way,
Sulfur flames illumined
The entrance to a cave.
In the crimson smoke
That shrouded everything,
With a distant calling
The forest seemed to ring
Straight across the ravine,
Startled and appalled,
The rider walked his horse
To the haunting call.
As he neared, a dragon
Suddenly appeared.
The rider saw its tail
And tightly gripped his spear.
The dragon breathed out fire
With a blinding light,
Thrice around a maiden
Winding his spine.
The body of the dragon,
Bending like a whip,
Held the maiden’s shoulder
With a solid grip.
A beautiful, young maiden,
By that county’s customs,
Was given to the monster
As a form of ransom.
The village folk surrendered
This beauty with high hopes
To satisfy the serpent
And to protect their homes.
The monster squeezed her arms
And coiling her throat,
He left the victim feeling
Hopeless and distraught.
The rider, with a prayer,
Gazing at the sky,
Ready for the battle,
Held his spear up high.
Eyelids tightly shut.
Summits. Clouded spheres.
Waters. Fords and rivers.
Centuries and years.
The wounded rider lies.
His body barely moves.
The loyal horse is trampling
The dragon with its hooves.
The dragon’s body’s fallen
By the watering-place.
The rider is a confounded.
The maiden’s in a daze.
The midday sky is shinning,
As azure clouds unfurl.
Who is she? A princess?
Or just a peasant girl?
Now, in joyous happiness
The soul can’t cease to weep,
And now, unable to resist,
The body falls asleep.
Now, his health’s returning
Now, he’s weak once more.
From the loss of blood,
He’s feeling weak and sore.
But their hearts are beating.
First one, then the other
Coming back to life
And falling back in slumber.
Summits. Clouded spheres.
A lilac heat sickened the meadow;
high in the wood, a cathedral’s sharp, nicked groins.

My thoughts are greedy and malicious.
My back hurts. Everywhere I look,
I see only sky-blue patches.
The church bell was droning. It stopped.
I am alone with myself.
Silk of scarlet creaks and bends
Beneath the clumsy needle.
A seal lies over all phenomena.

translation.ru: Одно с другим как будто слито.
translation.en: It is as though they are fused, one to another.
Having taken one in, I try to divine

translation.ru: За ним другое, — то, что скрыто.
translation.en: The other behind it — that which is hidden.

translation.ru: И этот шелк мне кажется — Огнем.
translation.en: And this silk seems Fire to me.

translation.ru: И вот уж не огнем — а Кровью.
translation.en: And now no longer Fire, but Blood.

translation.ru: А кровь — лишь знак того, что мы зовем
translation.en: And blood is but a sign of that which we
Call, in our poor language, Love.

translation.ru: Любовь — лишь звук... Но в этот поздний час
translation.en: Love is but a sound… At this late hour,
What comes next I can’t reveal.

translation.ru: Нет, не огонь, не кровь... а лишь атлас
translation.en: No, not fire, nor blood, but only satin
Creaks beneath the timid needle.
All my «I» swings like a pendulum,
And its sweep is very wide.
It sways, slides, alternates:
Now it's hope, now it's fear.
From knowing, from not knowing, from flickering
My flesh is dying.
Can you condemn it, O Lord!,
This painful, insane swaying?
End it and stop the rippling torment.
Halt it! Halt it!

translation.ru: Но только не на ужасе падения,
translation.en: Only not at the terror of falling,
But at love's upward swing.
It seemed I would never again
Disturb the silence of my soul,
But a star flared up in the window,

translation.ru: И я опять мою жалею душу.
translation.en: And again I pity my soul.
Everything died long ago in my soul.
Hatred and anger burned out.
O, my poor soul, just one thing
Is preserved in it: scornful contempt.

translation.ru: В своей бессовестной и жалкой низости,
translation.en: A shameless thing, of every vileness capable,

translation.ru: Она, как пыль, сера, как прах земной.
translation.en: It is as drab as dust, as earthly dust.

translation.ru: И умираю я от этой близости,
translation.en: I perish of a nearness inescapable;
Its fatal coils about my limbs are thrust.
A shaggy poulp, embracing me, and pricking me,
And as a serpent cold against my heart,
Its branching scales are poisoned arrows sticking me;
Worse than their bite: repulsion's horrid smart.

translation.ru: О, если б острое почуял жало я!
translation.en: Oh, were its sting a veritable knife in me!
But it is flaccid, clumsy, still and numb.
Thus sluggishly sucking the very life in me,

translation.ru: И нет к ней доступа — она глуха.
translation.en: A torpid dragon, dreadful, deaf, and dumb.
With stubborn rings it winds in mute obscurity
And clings caressingly, its purpose whole.

translation.ru: И эта мертвая, и эта черная,
translation.en: And this dead thing, this loathsome black impurity,
This horror that I shrink from — is my soul.

translation.ru: Не слушайте меня, не стоит: бедные
translation.en: Don’t listen to me, no worth to it: the poor
Words I speak; I lie. And if

translation.ru: И если в сердце знанья есть победные, —
translation.en: the heart has conquering knowledge.
I keep it from people.

translation.ru: Как дети, люди: злые и невинные,
translation.en: Like children, people are evil and innocent,
Loving, they know how to offend.
They aren’t of mountains — buts valleys…

translation.ru: Им надо знать, — но рано знать.
translation.en: They need to know, but it’s too early for them.
The statuary times are passing…
The soul awaits its cherished spans
Before the times, weary of silence,
We lie, yearn for and entertain.

translation.ru: Так и теперь, сплетая речь размерную,
translation.en: And now, weaving speech with measure,
I tell only of the unnecessary.

translation.ru: А тайну грозную, последнюю и верную —
translation.en: But of the secret — final, formidable, true,

translation.ru: Я всё равно вам не скажу.
translation.en: I shall not tell you all the same.

translation.ru: Если гаснет свет — я ничего не вижу.
translation.en: If light is felled — I am able to see nothing,

translation.ru: Если человек зверь — я его ненавижу.
translation.en: If a man is a beast — I hate him and scorn,

translation.ru: Если человек хуже зверя — я его убиваю.
translation.en: If he’s worse than beasts — I kill him, laughing,

translation.ru: Если кончена моя Россия — я умираю.
translation.en: If my Russia is over — I die and I mourn.

translation.ru: Страшно оттого, что не живется — спится.
translation.en: It’s awful not to live but only sleep...
To see all's being ever multiplied,

translation.ru: В прошлом грехов так неистово много,
translation.en: To have in past so wildly many sins,

translation.ru: Что и оглянуться страшно на Бога.
translation.en: That it’s a shame to look up at the sky.

translation.ru: Да и когда замолить мне грехи мои?
translation.en: When can I pray for mercy for my sins?

translation.ru: Ведь я на последнем склоне круга...
translation.en: I’m on the last of circles’ strong incline.
But most dread and shameful is the thing,

translation.ru: Это что никто не любит друг друга...
translation.en: That no one loves now any one.
I am exhausted by a weariness,
My soul wounded is, in blood...
Is there compassion really not on us,
Is there indeed on us no love?
We do fulfill a will that is too strict,
As shadows, softly, trace without,
On way, that is not maybe to predict,
We move to there none knows in fact.
And burden of life that too heavy is,
That is more harder if more then...
And death unknown’s waiting in increase
At locked doors which the same’s again.
Resistance and astonishment without
We’re doing all what does want God.
No inspiration with had he created us
But after that to love could not.
A helpless crowd are we, falling are,
Believing helplessly in might,
And from above like a sepulchral slab
Is pressing us by a blind sky.
There is this hard,
This shameful.
Almost impossible —
Hard:
It is to lift the eyelashes
And look into the face of a mother,
Whose son was killed.

translation.ru: Но не надо говорить об этом.
translation.en: But one shouldn’t talk about that.
Oh, do not trust the nighttime hour!
It is filled with evil beauty.

translation.ru: В этот час люди близки к смерти,
translation.en: In the nighttime people are close to death,
And flowers alone are strangely alive.
Dark and warm are the quiet walls,
And the hearth is long without fire…

translation.ru: И я жду от цветов измены, —
translation.en: And from the flowers I await betrayals,
For the flowers hate me.
Among them I feel uneasy and hot;
Their aroma is stifling and bold,
But to run away from them is not
Possible—no escape from their arrows.
The evening casts its rays of light
Upon their petals through the blood-stained satin…
The tender body comes to life—
The evil flowers have awoken.
From the toxic arum measured
Droplets fall upon the carpet…
Everything is mysterious and uncertain…
And seems to me a quiet argument.
They rustle; they stir and respire;
Like enemies, they keep their eye on me.
Everything I think—they know, they hear,
And they want to poison me.
Oh, do not trust the nighttime hour!
Beware of evil beauty.

translation.ru: В этот час мы все ближе к смерти,
translation.en: In the nighttime we are all closer to death,
The flowers alone are alive.
To him who triumphs I shall give white garments.
— Book of Revelation
He tempers me — with His remoteness,
I accept the test.
I accept with resignation
His love — His silence.
And the more mute my love,
The more unattainable, constant it becomes,
And the more beautiful is my anticipation,
The future union — more indissoluble.

translation.ru: Времен и сроков я не ведаю,
translation.en: I know nothing of time and calendars;
I remain in His hand — I am His creation...
But to triumph — as He has triumphed —
I desire the ultimate trial.
So I surrender my daring soul
To the Creator of my torment.
The Lord has said: “I shall send a white garment
To him who triumphs.”
It's thirteen now! Quite recently
We welcomed greeting it with love.
At thirteen, wilfully and boldly
It showed its nature well enough.
Again, your day of birth is coming...
You vicious naughty boy! For once
Do not expect either good wishes

translation.ru: Не требуй и не жди от нас.
translation.en: Or great festivities from us.
And if the dear land of ours
Used to be burnt and poured with blood,
Do you, Young one, really have to
Act like your father and granddad?

translation.ru: Они — не ты. Ты больше знаешь.
translation.en: They're different. For you know better.
You are fated to a different thing.
And yet somehow our new wine "sherry"
You pour into the old wineskin.

translation.ru: Ты плачешь, каешься? Ну, что же!
translation.en: Do you repent and cry? No words!
"I'm waiting — says the world, — I mean,
You'd better leave the bloody roads
At least when you are fifteen!"

translation.ru: Я в тесной келье — в этом мире.
translation.en: My world is like a chamber, narrow, —
It’s very low, very small.
In four its corners sit four fellows —
Four spiders, diligent in all.
They are all fat, adroit, and dirty,
And always spin and spin the web...
And it is awful — their portly,
Monotonous and even step.
With four their webs, when they were ready,
They spun the immense one, at last.
I watch their fat backs’ movement, steady,
In darkness of the stinking dust.
My eyes — under the webbing’s level:
It’s gray, and soft, and sticky, yet.
And they are glad with gladness, evil, —
Four spiders, fat.
From this exhausting weakness
Nowhere to go! Nowhere to go!
Which flows around my heart
Like water! Like water!
Was it really written — (and by whom?) —
In the heavens,

translation.ru: Чтоб въедались в душу два демона,
translation.en: That two demons, hope and fear,
Should eat into my soul?
I won't be saved, I have been struggling
For so long! For so long!

translation.ru: Все равно утону, уж скорей бы ко дну…
translation.en: I'm sure to fall, let me reach the bottom,
But where's the bottom?
I look at a sea — the greedy one and fervent,
Chained to the earth, on the depleted shore...
Stand by a gulf — over the endless heavens,

translation.ru: И улететь к лазури не могу.
translation.en: And could not fly to azure, as before.
I didn’t decide to join or slaves, or rebels,

translation.ru: Нет смелости ни умереть, ни жить...
translation.en: Have no a courage nor to live, nor — die...

translation.ru: Мне близок Бог — но не могу молиться,
translation.en: I feel my God — but cannot say my prayers,

translation.ru: Хочу любви — и не могу любить.
translation.en: I want my love — but can’t find love of mine.

translation.ru: Я к солнцу, к солнцу руки простираю
translation.en: I send to sun my worship and my groan,
I see a sheet of clouds, pale and cold...

translation.ru: Мне кажется, что истину я знаю —
translation.en: What is a truth? It seems to me, I know, —

translation.ru: И только для нее не знаю слов.
translation.en: But for the truth I have not the right world.
My window is high o'er the earthly spaces,
O'er the earthly spaces;

translation.ru: Я вижу только небо с вечернею зарёю,
translation.en: I behold but the sky with evening's red traces,
With evening's red traces.

translation.ru: И небо кажется пустым и бледным,
translation.en: And the gaze of the sky is so faded and dreary,
So faded and dreary;

translation.ru: Оно не сжалится над сердцем бедным,
translation.en: No pity it has for the heart that is weary,
For my heart that is weary.

translation.ru: Увы, в печали безумной я умираю,
translation.en: Alas, by a frenzied dismay I am riven,
I am riven;

translation.ru: Стремлюсь к тому, чего я не знаю,
translation.en: I know not the thing whereto
I am driven, I am driven.

translation.ru: И это желание не знаю откуда
translation.en: Nor whence is the wish that I bow myself under;
I bow myself under;

translation.ru: Но сердце хочет и просит чуда,
translation.en: But my heart is desiring and craving a wonder,
A wonder.

translation.ru: О, пусть будет то, чего не бывает,
translation.en: O may it be aught that life never offers,
That life [never offers;
Unto me 'tis a wonder the sky wanly proffers,
That it proffers.

translation.ru: Но плачу без слёз о неверном обете,
translation.en: But tearless I weep for the vow that is broken,
For the vow that is broken.

translation.ru: Мне нужно то, чего нет на свете,
translation.en: The thing that I seek is no earth-given token,
No earth-given token.
I offer prayers for the Devil,
O, Lord! He is your creature.
I love the Devil, for I see

translation.ru: Что вижу в нем — мое страданье.
translation.en: My suffering within him.
In torment and in struggle
He weaves his nets with care.

translation.ru: И не могу я не жалеть
translation.en: And I cannot help but pity

translation.ru: Того, кто, как и я, — страдает.
translation.en: The one who suffers as I do.
When our flesh shall rise again
For retribution at Thy judgment,
Forgive him then, O Lord, his sins,
His madness for his pain.
How this bitter cold’s exhausted me,
This frost in my heart.

translation.ru: Мне бы заплакать, чтоб сердце оттаяло,
translation.en: If only I could weep to thaw my heart,
But there are no tears...
Your sad star
Was briefly my joy:
It sparkled and fell
To the earth, a dark stone.
Your sad soul
Did not dare to love a smile,
And rushing from me,
It put on a black shroud.

translation.ru: Но я навек с твоей судьбой
translation.en: But I joined my fate
To yours forever, in one hope:

translation.ru: Где б ни была ты — я с тобой,
translation.en: Wherever you are, I am with you,

translation.ru: И я люблю тебя, как прежде.
translation.en: And I love you as before.
The vomit of the war — the feast of the October!
From all this wine, that desperately stinks,
Oh, how loathsome was later your hangover,
My country, sunk in poverty and sins!

translation.ru: Какому дьяволу, какому псу в угоду,
translation.en: To please which dogs or swarms of awful demons,
To what a dream of what an evil sleep,
The people killed their freedom in their madness,

translation.ru: И даже не убил — засек кнутом?
translation.en: And even didn’t killed — just flogged to death by a weep?

translation.ru: Смеются дьяволы и псы над рабьей свалкой,
translation.en: The dogs and imps laugh o’er a fishy bone
And guns, too, laugh, through their mouths-spans...

translation.ru: И скоро в старый хлев ты будешь загнан палкой,
translation.en: You’ll soon be penned by sticks into your pigsty, old, —
The people, not respecting own saints.
To V. Zlobin
I roar — a dying lion...
D’ you see all this, my God!
Between machine’s teeth iron,
My flesh is being deformed.
I’ll bear pains my own…
But would I — all, I feel?
All that in systems goes on,
Between the clogs of wheels?
Two threads are closely hafted,
The ends are unconfined.
'Tis «yea» and «nay», — not grafted,
Not grafted, — but entwined.
Dim is the weft that mates them
Close and inanimate,
But wakening awaits them,
And they the same await.
End unto end is taken,
Fresh «yea» and «nay» ignite,
And «yea» and «nay» awaken,
Into one moulding shaken,
And from their death comes, — light.

translation.ru: Молчи. Молчи. Не говори с людьми,
translation.en: Be silent. Be silent. Don't talk to people,
Don't lift the veil from your heart.

translation.ru: Все люди на земле — пойми! Пойми! —
translation.en: All the people on earth — please understand! —
Are not worth one single word.

translation.ru: Не плачь. Не плачь. Блажен, кто от людей
translation.en: Don't cry. Don't cry. Blessed is he
Who chose to hide his pain from people.

translation.ru: Весь этот мир одной слезы твоей,
translation.en: This world's not worth a single tear,

translation.ru: Да и ничьей слезы не стоит.
translation.en: Your tear or that of anyone.
Hold back, feel ashamed to show your suffering,
Withdraw and pass on calmly.

translation.ru: Ни слов, ни слез, ни вздоха, — ничего
translation.en: The earth, the people don't deserve
Your words, your tears, your sighs. Nothing.
To return to simplicity — why?
Perhaps I do know why.
But that returning is not for everyone.
Those like me, cannot.
Through a nettling shrub I pass,
It is prehensile, I will not break away...
Let me fall,
I will not reach a second simplicity,
There is no going back.
I hate to submit to the people’s desire.
Who likes a yoke of a slave?

translation.ru: Целую жизнь мы друг друга судим, —
translation.en: Trough whole our life we’re in permanent trial,
After — we lay in a grave.
I can’t submit to the Heavenly Low
If Lord are my love and my light.
He gave me the ways on the earth, I’ve to go,
How I can step aside?
I break all nets by which people are drawn —
Dreams, deepest sadness and bliss.

translation.ru: Мы не рабы, — но мы Божьи дети,
translation.en: We are not slaves, we are children His own,
Children are free as He is.
I pray my God, who produced all the living,
Using the name of His Son:
Father, let our unambiguous willing
Ever be righteous and one!
And only one time with a foam
Wave is rising and falling down.
And heart can't live with parting tone,
There's no a betrayal — only love.
We can be angry or be playing,

translation.ru: Иль лжем — но в сердце тишина.
translation.en: Or lying - but the heart is silent.
We never could produce betrayal:
The soul is one — and love is one.
Monotonoudsly and so desertly,
With only one quality is powered,

translation.ru: Проходит жизнь... И в жизни длинной
translation.en: Life goes away... And in this life, well,
You know, that love is one, and only one.
Immutable — causes eternal,
And constancy - is deep as chasm.

translation.ru: И дальше путь, и ближе вечность,
translation.en: And further - there's the way etherial,
And it is clear: love — is one.
With blood we pay for love entirely,
But faithful soul — quite loyal,
And we love only with one love rather...
Love's one on earth, as death is one.
Thou queen of all serenity,
Soul of my soul, most chaste,
I summon thee, divinity,
I summon thee, make haste!
But to the tryst thy offering
Shall not be brought alone.
My guilt will come, my suffering,
My sin will lift its moan.
Before thy heart insulted so,
In shame my head will sink;
And I, who once exulted so,
My humble tears shall drink.
Forgive me that diurnity
Is all my love could dower;
That not for all eternity,—
I made thee for an hour.
Alone my will hath kindled here
Thy being from the void.
And thou shalt soon have dwindled here,
By my sole will destroyed.
As I, thou shalt grow tremulous,
Till all my strength is gone,
To fall, of silence emulous,
Into oblivion.
I came across a little demon,
Thin and scrawny, like a gnat.
His body was that of a child,

translation.ru: Лицом же дик: остер и стар.
translation.en: His face was wild: sharp and old.
It rained... He 'trembled, growing darker,
Disheveled fur grew wet,
And I said to myself, “Imagine that!
He too is cold. He too is alone.”
People keep saying: Love, love! I do not know,
Do not ever hear it. Have not seen it.
But pity... pity I understand.
And I seized the little demon.
Let’s go, kid? Want to warm yourself?
Don't be afraid. Don’t bristle.
Why hang about here in the street?
A lump of sugar... Want to come?

translation.ru: А он вдруг эдак сочно, зычно,
translation.en: And he then suddenly in such a lush, loud.
Masculine, caressing bass
(I must admit, it wasn’t even decent

translation.ru: И жутко было это в нем) —
translation.en: And frightening it was coming from him)
Roared: “Sugar? Don’t be a fool:
Don’t cat sugar, my sweet.
Give me some veal, and soup...

translation.ru: Уж я пойду к тебе — совсем».
translation.en: Then I’ll come to your place to stay for good...”
He angered me with his bragging...
And I had wanted to be helpful.

translation.ru: Да ну тебя с твоим нахальством!
translation.en: To hell with you and your effrontery!

translation.ru: И не спеша пошел я прочь.
translation.en: And slowly I went off.
But he screwed up his face and in a thin voice
Began to grunt... Looked sick...
And again I felt sorry for him... And the little demon
I dragged off, with an effort to my home.
I looked at him in the lamplight: sickly, repulsive,

translation.ru: Не то дитя, не то старик.
translation.en: Half child and half old man,
Repeating all the time: “...my sweet, my sweet...”
I left him there. Got used to him.
And even somehow in the end
Identified with the little devil.
At midday he would jump round like a young goat,
Grow dark by nightfall, like a corpse.
Would sometimes strut round like a man,
And sometimes fuss about me like a woman.
And if it rained — he had a canine smell
And licked his fur by the fire.
Before I used to worry about everything,
I wanted this, I dreamed of that...

translation.ru: А с ним мой дом… не то, что ожил,
translation.en: But my house with him... I wouldn’t say that it came to life,
But there was a kind of bloom on it.
It was joylessly happy,
Gently dreamy, and dark...
And for the little devil and myself, life was sweetly dull...

translation.ru: Дитя, старик, — не все ль равно?
translation.en: Child or old man, what did it matter!
He was so odd, so soft, so scrawny,
Like a decaying mushroom,
So tenacious, sweet and sticky,
Kept sticking, sticking — and stuck fast.
And both of us became one thing.

translation.ru: Уж я не с ним — я в нем, я в нем!
translation.en: No more am I with him — I’m in him, in him,

translation.ru: Я сам в ненастье пахну псиной
translation.en: It’s I who, in foul weather, acquires a canine reek,
And lick my fur beside the fire...

translation.ru: Он пришел ко мне, — а кто, не знаю,
translation.en: He came to me — I don't know who he is.
He encircled me within a ring.

translation.ru: Он сказал, что я его не знаю,
translation.en: He said that I don't know who he is,
But he hid his face behind a cape.

translation.ru: Я просил его, чтоб он помедлил.
translation.en: I begged him to tarry longer,
To step back, not touch me, and to wait.
If he only could but tarry longer

translation.ru: И в кольцо меня не замыкал.
translation.en: And not enclose me within that ring.
The Dark One was amazed: "What can I do?"
Quietly he laughed under his cloak.

translation.ru: «Твой же грех обвился, — что могу я?
translation.en: "Your own sin encircles you. What can I do?

translation.ru: Твой же грех обвил тебя кольцом».
translation.en: Your own sin enclosed you in that ring."
As he left he also said: "You're wretched!"
As he left he sank into a void.
"Break the ring around you. Don't be wretched!"
Break and stretch it out into a line."

translation.ru: Он ушел, но он опять вернется.
translation.en: So he left, but he will yet return.

translation.ru: Он ушел — и не открыл лица.
translation.en: So he left and never showed his face.

translation.ru: Что мне делать, если он вернется?
translation.en: What am I to do if he returns?
There's no way that I can break the ring.
Brightly the hooves clatter...
What is it, by the bridge?
All erased, all is forgotten,
In the secret of thoughts, a void...
I only listen to the hooves,
to the din and cries by the bridge.
It starts running stoutly, huddling,
The multilegged It.
Entrancing — and boring.
Good — and it matters not.
And I follow, watch how stoutly
The formidable It rushes on.
It rolls and clamours,
Chomping and chewing,
Washing off, eroding everything.
What has my soul lived on.
The soul enters a stranger’s body
Pours in — and dies.
The ringing hooves are greedy,
It is savage, loud and dark.
